}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Product Key Features=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCN9074 ([https://www.524wifi.com/index.php/wifi6-module/ ''Pine'' series module]) • '''WiFi 6E''' *PCI Express 3.0 interface (M.2, Key E), JTAG/UART connector *6GHz max 23dBm output power (per chain), up to 4804Mbps *4x spatial streams (4SS) Multi-user MIMO (MU-MIMO)
===Purchase Sample=== [https://www.shop.compex.com.sg/product-page/pn02-7 Compex System Sample Store]
